short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension searches the Australian designated regional area postcodes on LinkedIn and SEEK, then highlights it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension searches the Australian designated regional area postcodes on LinkedIn and SEEK, then highlights it in Green for Regional centres and other regional areas, Yellow for Cities and major regional centres, or Red for Major cities.
